Literature.Title: An explainable few-shot learning model for the directed evolution of antimicrobial peptides
Literature.Author: Gao Q, Ge L, Wang Y, Zhu Y, Liu Y, Zhang H, Huang J, Qin Z

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CGMCC 1.2389(MIC=2.5-5µM),Aeromonas hydrophila CGMCC 1.2017(MIC=5-10µM),Pseudomonas fluorescens CGMCC 1.3202(MIC=5-10µM),Photobacterium damselae subsp. damselae(MIC=<1.25µM),Shigella flexneri CGMCC 1.1868(MIC=<1.25µM)
